name: Osprey Transporter Flap - Unisex
description: This rugged pack with minimalist styling. It has a well thought out interior and the comfortable carry you'd expect from Osprey. Flap top design offers quick access to the main compartment, while a blinker light attachment point and water-resistant exterior make it a fine choice for bike commutes.Rugged nylon fabric is coated with TPU for added water resistance.Ridged foam back panel is comfortable and breathable.Adjustable sternum strap with whistle.Removable waistbelt is made from 25mm webbing.Convenient top flap access, with a durable aluminum closure buckle.Vertical zip pocket on front panel secures small items.Padded laptop sleeve.Document sleeve.Internal water bottle pocket with external zip access.Key clip.Attachment point for a blinky bike light.
